trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Drawing2D" /> namespace provides advanced two-dimensional and vector graphics functionality.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Drawing2D" /> fornece funcionalidade avançada bidimensional e de gráfico vetorial.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists some of the important classes and enumerations in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace, grouped into categories.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista algumas das classes importantes e enumerações no <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace, agrupado em categorias.

trans-unit.source: Class category
trans-unit.target: Categoria de classe

trans-unit.source: Details
trans-unit.target: Detalhes

trans-unit.source: - Graphics and Graphics paths
trans-unit.target: -Gráficos e caminhos de gráficos

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> classes report information about the current `Graphics` object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsState> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsContainer> classes relatam informações sobre o atual `Graphics` objeto.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> classes represent a series of lines and curves.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> as classes representam uma série de linhas e curvas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathData> classes provide detailed information about the contents of a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathData> classes fornecem informações detalhadas sobre o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> objeto.

trans-unit.source: - Matrix and transformation related types
trans-unit.target: -A matriz e a transformação de tipos relacionados

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> class represents a matrix for geometric transforms.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Matrix> classe representa uma matriz para transformações geométricas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> enumeration specifies the order for matrix transformations.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.MatrixOrder> enumeração Especifica a ordem para transformações de matriz.

trans-unit.source: - Brush classes
trans-unit.target: -Classes de pincel

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> classes enable you to fill shapes with either a gradient, or hatch pattern, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathGradientBrush> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> classes permitem que você preencher formas com um gradiente ou padrão de hachura, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: - Enumeration related to lines
trans-unit.target: -Enumeração relacionado às linhas

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> enumerations enable you to specify cap styles for a line.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineCap> e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.CustomLineCap> enumerações permitem especificar os estilos de extremidade para uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin> enumeration enables you to specify how two lines are joined in a path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LineJoin> Habilita enumeração especificar como duas linhas é unidas em um caminho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> enumeration enables you specify the alignment of the drawing tip, when you draw a line.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenAlignment> habilita de enumeração, especifique o alinhamento da ponta do desenho, quando você desenhar uma linha.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> enumeration specifies the pattern a line should be filled with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PenType> enumeração Especifica o padrão de uma linha deve ser preenchida com.

trans-unit.source: - Enumerations related to filling shapes and paths
trans-unit.target: -Enumerações relacionadas para preencher formas e demarcadores

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration specifies fill styles for a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeração Especifica os estilos de preenchimento para um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> class specifies a blend pattern for a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.Blend> classe especifica um padrão de mesclagem para um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode> enumeration specifies the fill style for a <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.FillMode> enumeração Especifica o estilo de preenchimento para um <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>.

trans-unit.source: Classes in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> namespace are not supported for use in a Windows or [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: Classes de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D> não há suporte para o namespace para uso em um Windows ou [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] serviço.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes in one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de usar essas classes em um destes tipos de aplicativo pode gerar problemas inesperados, como exceções de desempenho e tempo de execução do serviço reduzidas.
